title: Font needed
content:
Hallo,

May somebody tell me which font this is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829165438im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4125.jpg)

Thanks!
author: alpar

comments.content:
probably another example of hard coded printer fonts. i'd try searching for dot matrix fonts. they're similar.

[http://www.identifont.com/list?2+matrix+1+1GS+1+1SS+1+1SN+1+1GT+2+4UA+9+...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829165438/http:/www.identifont.com/list?2+matrix+1+1GS+1+1SS+1+1SN+1+1GT+2+4UA+9+1SZ+12+4U9+17+CL8+19+1SO+19+9AL+20+LPW+31+26N7+32+VF+34 "http://www.identifont.com/list?2+matrix+1+1GS+1+1SS+1+1SN+1+1GT+2+4UA+9+1SZ+12+4U9+17+CL8+19+1SO+19+9AL+20+LPW+31+26N7+32+VF+34")
